name: Skata Saturation Pack
customPrimary:
The missiles will detonate at a random distance from the launcher, turning a vast area of the battlefield into a hazard zone.

On detonation each missile generates an anomaly which deals %s fragmentation damage per second for %s seconds to anything caught in the area.
